There are two test data packages that enable any Pharmaverse package development team to re-use test SDTM and ADaM: 

- [`{pharmaversesdtm}`](https://github.com/pharmaverse/pharmaversesdtm): a data package that stores test SDTM data. If the current available data does not meet your need, update or add the new data in this package based on the instructions provided on the [how to update page](https://pharmaverse.github.io/pharmaversesdtm/cran-release/) 

- [`{pharmaverseadam}`](https://github.com/pharmaverse/pharmaverseadam): a data package that stores test ADaM data created from {admiral} templates.
